Name: Outpost Defender 2-Beta
About the game: The Space-Outpost is under assault! You must defend it. Fight off infinite waves of alien invaders. Survive as long as possible. A retro/arcade pixel-art outbreak challenge to set the highest score! Single-player and Local Co-Op enabled. Use stackable powerups to increase your abilities. Use Challenge Mode to design your own creative enemy waves!
